column4: The number of institutions represented in that column of data.  This number is used primarily for peer group data.

column2: Secured By 1-4 Family Residential Properties in Nonaccrual Status
column4: Total loans secured by 1-4 family residential properties that are no longer accruing interest held in domestic offices of the institution.

column2: Nonaccrual Loans Secured  By 1-4 Family First Liens
column4: Closed-end loans secured by first liens on 1-4 family residential properties that are held in domestic office and are past due and no longer accruing interest.

column2: Nonaccrual Loans Secured  By 1-4 Family Junior Liens
column4: Closed-end loans secured by junior liens on 1-4 family residential properties that are held in domestic office and are past due and no longer accruing interest.

column2: Nonaccrual Home Equity Lines of Credit
column4: Total revolving, open-end loans secured by 1-4 family residential properties and extended under lines of credit which are no longer accruing interest held in domestic offices of the institution.
